text: Controversy Sells is the second and last collaborative studio album by American rappers Paul Wall and Chamillionaire. It was released in 2005. The album was at #50 on the Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums chart. There is a chopped and screwed version by DJ Michael '5000' Watts for Swishahouse. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2005 albums Category:Chamillionaire albums
title: Controversy Sells
